noun.description: The action or process of bringing something into a disordered or confusing state.
examples: the muddling of fact and fiction is a tried-and-true tactic of totalitarian regimes
one of the points that he makes is that there was a muddling of the messages

noun.description: The action or process of mixing a drink or stirring an ingredient into a drink.
examples: the muddling helps ensure that all the flavors are well blended
the map is a muddling haze, with place names in German, Russian, Polish, and Lithuanian
